org.apache.shale.clay.config.beans
Class ValueChangeListenerBean

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.shale.clay.config.beans.AbstractBean
      org.apache.shale.clay.config.beans.ComponentBean
          org.apache.shale.clay.config.beans.InnerComponentBean
              org.apache.shale.clay.config.beans.ValueChangeListenerBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable
public class ValueChangeListenerBean
extends InnerComponentBean
implements Serializable

This meta component will be used to construct a JSF ValueChangeListener. It is a subclass of ComponentBean where this class acts like an enumerated type.

See Also:
